other_tests.findings: Negative for toxigenic C. difficile by the Illumigene DNA amplification assay.

Large nonhemorrhagic left pleural effusion which has mildly increased in size; interval decrease in pancreatic head pseudocyst; slight increase in size of pseudocyst in pancreatic body; unchanged size of tail pseudocyst.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Pancreatic head pseudocyst decreased from 5.3 x 3.7 cm to 4.1 x 3.4 cm; pseudocyst in uncinate decreased from 2.7 x 2.1 cm to 2.5 x 2.1 cm; pseudocyst in pancreatic body increased from 1.3 x 0.5 cm to 1.8 x 1.0 cm; tail pseudocyst unchanged at 2.7 x 1.2 cm.
